name: The Purgatory
description:
This game was made for the Tiki Game Jam #3 hosted by Game Dev Teacher! Story :

You wake up in a strange place with no memories of who you were.
You only know the following : you died and whatever you did in life brought you here.

Controls :

Z/Q/S/D to move around.

Credits :

Background music by DWOBoyle on freesound.org
Footsteps sounds by Nox_Sound on freesound.org
Font by OMAR MOGOLLON on Dafont
Body model made with ReadyPlayerMe
Animal skull by Loïc Norgeot
Portal texture by Coreb Games
